title: Game freezes a split second
body: When i play a match every champion and i turn in game my games freezes a little bit and then it works. Do u guys know a way to fix it?

replies.body: If your screen is freezing completely, then there may be a driver or game file problem that's having trouble initially rending the game.  It's getting through, but has some hiccups along the way.  I suggest using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your drivers and settings to help with this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
